id.description: A unique string identifying this user.

login.description: The email address this user uses to login.

created_at.description: The time this user was created.

modified_at.description: The time this user was last modified.

language.description: The language of this user. ISO 639-1 Language Code.

space_amount.description: The user's total available space amount in bytes.

space_used.description: The amount of space in use by the user.

max_upload_size.description: The maximum individual file size in bytes this user can have.

tracking_codes.description: An array of key/value pairs set by the user's admin.

can_see_managed_users.description: Whether this user can see other enterprise users in its contact list.

is_sync_enabled.description: Whether or not this user can use Box Sync

avatar_url.description: URL of this user's avatar image.

is_exempt_from_device_limits.description: Whether to exempt this user from Enterprise device limits.

is_exempt_from_login_verification.description: Whether or not this user must use two-factor authentication.

enterprise.description: Mini representation of this user's enterprise, including the ID of its enterprise
